entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
